1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | General utilities.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Class
6  ( Name (..),
7    Named,
8    named,
9    Map, ManyMap,
10    YesNo (..),
11    Index,
12    Collect,
13    Choose (..),
14  ) where
15
16-- | Types that has name.
17class Name a where
18    name  :: a -> String
19    names :: [a] -> [String]
20    names = map name
21
22-- | Entry in association list.
23type Named a = (String, a)
24
25named :: (Name a) => a -> Named a
26named a = (name a, a)
27
28-- | Map from something to same type.
29{-# DEPRECATED Map "Replaced by 'Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Type.Map'." #-}
30type Map a = a -> a
31
32-- | Map from something to list of something.
33{-# DEPRECATED ManyMap "Replaced by 'Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Type.ManyMap'." #-}
34type ManyMap a = a -> [a]
35
36-- | Type of value which is classified as yes or no.
37data YesNo a = Yes a | No a
38               deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
39
40type Index = Int
41
42type Collect a = [a] -> a
43
44-- ----------------------  Choose
45
46class Choose m where
47    (<|>) :: m a -> m a -> m a
48
49instance Choose Maybe where
50    (Just a)  <|> _  =  Just a
51    (Nothing) <|> b  =  b
52
53instance Choose (Either a) where
54    (Right a)  <|> _  =  Right a
55    (Left _)   <|> b  =  b
56
